- Location: Column C, Base  
- Date: Domitian

## 171 A {-}  
<div class="col2">  
  
^A^ *ʿnḫ nṯr nfr  *  
*mḥ nỉw.t tn   *  
  *n mw.t=f N.t  *  
  
^A^ Live the good god,    
who fills this city  
  for his mother, Neith.  
  
</div>  
  
## 171 B {-}  
<div class="col2">  
  
^B^ *ʿnḫ nṯr nfr  *  
*smȝwỉ wȝsy  *  
*mḥ gm-wš  *  
*nb snṯ  *  
*(twmtyns ḫwỉ) *  
  
^B^ Live the good god,  
who renews what is ruined,  
who fills what is found missing,  
lord of the foundation,  
(Domitian Augustus)  
  
</div>
